title: James Middleton engagement: Entrepreneur proposed to his French girlfriend
text:
James Middleton has proposed to his girlfriend and given her a sapphire ring.

Their engagement comes after a whirlwind romance between the Duchess of Cambridge's younger brother and French-born Alizee Thevenet, who met in the summer of 2018.

Thevenet, 29, a financial expert, was attending a meeting in the South Kensington Club at the same time as Middleton. His Cocker Spaniel, Ella, bounded up to her and they began talking.

Thevenet met the Royal Family earlier this year when the pair attended the wedding of Lady Gabriella Windsor, the daughter of Prince and Princess Michael of Kent, at St George's Chapel in Windsor.
description: James Middleton has proposed to his girlfriend and given her a sapphire ring.
